## Peti bankszámla cashflow napi bontásban

```{r echo=FALSE}
# Load the package required to read JSON files.
library("rjson")
library("foreach")
library("iterators")

# Give the input file name to the function.
result <- fromJSON(file = "data.json")

# Convert JSON file to a data frame.
data <- as.data.frame(result)

plot(data$ID, data$Salary)
barplot(t(as.matrix(data$Salary)), main="Demo plot", names.arg=data$ID)

foreach(i=data$Salary, c=icount()) %do%
  print(data$Salary[c])

start <- as.Date("19-01-01",format="%y-%m-%d")
end   <- as.Date("19-12-31",format="%y-%m-%d")

theDate <- start

while (theDate <= end)
{
  print(paste0("http://website.com/api/",format(theDate,"%Y-%m-%d")))
  theDate <- theDate + 1                    
}
```
